text:
Hi there Nya,
Sorry for the late answer! Yes, she's very talented, I didn't get to see everything she did, bits there's really a lot to check there. There are a lot o good work on Instagram, if you look up hashtags like #characterdesign #framebyframe #celanimation #childrenillustration and many others of course.
I hope you have merry Christmas and enjoy this new year. Wish you all the best and that you achieve some goals and keep developing your work! Cheers!
